attributes.action: Make it obligatory for Sky news channel to continue to provide a "free to view" service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sky News intends to remove its "free to view" Sky News, Sky Sports, Sky Sports Extra and Sky 3 from the digital Freeview platform, and replace it with a subscription service. We request that the Culture Secretary Tessa Jowell, prevents Sky News Corporation by requiring Sky, as a condition of its broadcasting licence, from removing the Sky News channel as a free service on Freeview, which provides a valuable alternative 24 hours news service in competition with BBC News 24.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
